title: Pixel 3a Not Booting Past Google Logo
content:
So seemingly out of nowhere my screen phased out while in use; now upon booting the phone, it does not get past the Google logo. Though I am able to open the recovery menu by holding down power and volume down.
I tried connecting to the Android Flash Tool from Google, though I'm stuck on step one to enable USB Debugging and OEM Unlocking, because I cannot fully boot..
Any ideas on what I can try? Thank you!
